summary: The diff implements both REQ-73 and REQ-74 largely as specified. TunerShopPage.tsx is created with hero, about/mission, services, closing paragraph, tagline, location, and contact sections. The route is registered in App.tsx and a Tuner Shop entry point (Wrench icon) is added to TopBar.tsx. However, the hero section's subheading text differs from the spec — it uses 'Honda & Acura Specialists · Wenatchee, WA' instead of the required subheading 'Performance-focused automotive shop built for enthusiasts who demand more from their cars.' The file is truncated so full verification of the closing paragraph, tagline, location, and contact sections is limited.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero section subheading must read exactly: 'Performance-focused automotive shop built for enthusiasts who demand more from their cars.'
missing_requirements.reason: The hero section in TunerShopPage.tsx shows 'Honda & Acura Specialists · Wenatchee, WA' as the subheading instead of the required subheading text.
